backend/main.mo: Defines the main canister with types and maps for sales, expenses, petty cash, inventory, and stock movements, plus comparison modules.
backend/migration.mo: Provides migration logic to add expenseType to old expense entries based on category.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence mapping UI changes to specific frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of key frontend files and their responsibilities.
frontend/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers and custom OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app with routing via state, query client provider, theme provider, and shell layout.
frontend/src/components/AppShell.tsx: Layout component providing header, navigation, mobile menu, main content area, and footer.
frontend/src/components/ConfirmDialog.ts: Reusable confirmation dialog built on AlertDialog for destructive actions.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and manages the authenticated or anonymous backend actor and invalidates dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useExpenses.ts: Provides React Query hooks to fetch and manage expense entries, including create, update, and delete mutations.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity context and provider for authentication, exposing identity state, login, and logout utilities.
frontend/src/hooks/useInventory.ts: Fetches inventory items and stock movements, computes stock levels, and provides mutations for adding items and movements.
frontend/src/hooks/usePettyCash.ts: Handles petty cash transactions with querying, balance calculation, and adding new transactions.
frontend/src/hooks/useProfitAndLoss.ts: Computes profit and loss reports from sales and expenses within a date range, including category breakdowns.
frontend/src/hooks/useSales.ts: Provides hooks to fetch and mutate sales entries, including create, update, and delete operations.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind-based theme variables and styles for light and dark modes with a warm color palette.
frontend/src/lib/dateUtils.ts: Contains date parsing, formatting helpers, and a utility to filter entries by date range.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider, rendering the main App component.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Renders the main dashboard with a hero section, module navigation cards, and a quick stats placeholder.
frontend/src/pages/ExpensesPage.tsx: Provides full CRUD for expenses with filtering, dialogs, category/type labels, and date‑range tools.
frontend/src/pages/InventoryPage.tsx: Manages inventory items and stock movements with add dialogs, tabs, and low‑stock tracking.
frontend/src/pages/PettyCashPage.tsx: Handles petty cash transactions, balance display, date filtering, and an add‑transaction dialog.
frontend/src/pages/ReportsPage.tsx: Generates profit and loss reports for a date range with summary metrics and category breakdowns.
frontend/src/pages/SalesPage.tsx: React page for listing, filtering, adding, editing, and deleting sales entries with dialogs, form handling, and toast notifications.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme extensions, color tokens, fonts, animations, and plugin setup for the frontend UI.
project_state.json: Metadata file describing project state, features, requirements, and architectural notes for the restaurant management app.
